ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(AND(INCLUDES(Race__c,'Declined'),OR(INCLUDES(Race__c,'White'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Black or African American'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Black or African American'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'American Indian or Alaska Native'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Asian'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Abandoned'),INCLUDES(Race__c,'Unknown'))),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Declined cannot be choose with Another value
